summary: Completed comprehensive testing of KODEX MVP - EU AI Act compliance tool. Backend APIs fully functional (100% success rate). Frontend core flows working with minor session management observations.

design_issues.issue: Session timeout during extended testing redirects to login (expected behavior)

passed_tests: Questions endpoint returns 12 questions with version 1.0.0
Classification endpoint works with sample HR data (returns High-risk)
Assessments CRUD with classification and roadmap generation
Landing page loads with KODEX branding and CTAs
Example page shows static demonstration data
User registration from scan completion flow
Session timeout handling and redirect to login
